FoodContactSubstance: Copolymer of styrene (CAS Reg. No. 100-42-5), α-methylstyrene (CAS Reg. No. 98-83-9), methacrylic acid (CAS Reg. No. 79-41-4), n-butyl acrylate (CAS Reg.
